# isRelativeAltitudeAvailable()

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the current device supports generating data for relative altitude changes.

## Declaration

```swift
class func isRelativeAltitudeAvailable() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the device supports relative altitude changes or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it does not.

## Discussion

Use this method to determine if altitude updates are available before calling the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMAltimeter/startRelativeAltitudeUpdates(to:withHandler:)] method.

## Determining Altitude Availability

- **isAbsoluteAltitudeAvailable()**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the current device reports changes in the absolute altitude.
- **authorizationStatus()**: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to retrieve altimeter data.
- **CMAuthorizationStatus**: The authorization status for motion-related features.
